product_description: Tired of power cuts affecting your refrigeration needs? Well, then bring home this 265-litre refrigerator from Whirlpool. Featuring the IntelliSense Inverter Technology, this refrigerator not only reduces energy consumption, but it also gets connected automatically to your inverter in the event of a power cut to make for consistent cooling performance. And, even if there’s a fluctuation in voltage after the power is back, you don’t have to worry about connecting it to a stabilizer as it can smoothly run without one within the range of 130 - 300 volts.

With a base stand storage that can hold vegetables and other food items that do not need much cooling, the refrigerator comes with a stabilizer-free operation feature and a safety feature that automatically cuts power to the fridge in case of power fluctuations. With a beautifully crafted bar chrome handle, it also comes with a Grande door design that looks elegant. With a host of other features such as toughened glass shelves, an anti-bacterial gasket, rear safety cover and more, this Samsung refrigerator would be your ideal companion to keep your food and beverages fresh and appealing.

With its intelligent inverter compressor, this refrigerator provides excellent performance, energy savings, low noise, and stabiliser-free operation. This refrigerator's energy-efficient design helps you save money on your electric bills as well. Besides, you can connect this refrigerator to your home inverter in case of a power outage, thanks to its smart connect technology. This way, you can safely store food for long periods without having to worry about it going bad.

5 Star : For Energy savings up to 55%

product_name: LG 190 L Direct Cool Single Door 5 Star Refrigerator  (Blue Charm, GL-B201ABCZ)

product_description: The new LG GL-T292RBC3 comes with Inverter Linear Compressor is the next-generation technology that comes from simple physics: reduced frictions through structural enhancement allows more energy to be used on keeping food fresh. This model comes with 3 Star rating energy consumption. It’s Door Cooling+ makes inside temperature more even and cools the refrigerator 35% faster than the conventional cooling system. This reduces the temperature gap between the inner part and the door side of the compartment; thus letting the food remain fresh for long. (Based on third party test report comparing door basket cooling time from 32°C to 5°C under standard test conditions). Auto smart connect is a technology that helps connect your refrigerator to home inverter. Once the refrigerator is connected to the home inverter, every time the power goes off it automatically takes inverter power to run the refrigerator without any manual supervision. Multiple cooling air vents distribute and circulate cool air to every corner of the refrigerator, ensuring that each and every food item is properly cooled. This refrigerator comes with 3 shelves of spill proof Trimless tempered Glass material (unbreakable) that are meant to carry heavy load without any spillage, space to keep as much as 2 Litre Bottles in the refrigerator doors, egg tray and a vegetable compartment of 29.1 liters capacity with lattice type cover to maintain the moisture level within it, anti-bacterial and air tighten gasket. Special features of this refrigerator are spacious chiller zone, Convertible helps convert the freezer into fridge, enjoy increased storage capacity of your refrigerator with just one touch, humidity controller balance the air inside fridge cool & dry, deodorizer prevents from bad smells and keep you refrigerators fresh and do not need any stabilizer (100V~310V).

product_description: If you are looking for a smart and efficient refrigerator, then this LG refrigerator is ideal for you. Additionally, it comes with specially designed toughened glass shelves that can handle heavy loads, allowing you to keep large and heavy vessels in the fridge without any fears. product_description: LG GL-T412VPZX 408 L comes with Smart Inverter Compressor is the next-generation technology that comes from simple physics: reduced frictions through structural enhancement allows more energy to be used on keeping food fresh. This model comes with 3 Star rating energy consumption. It’s Door Cooling+ makes inside temperature more even and cools the refrigerator 35% faster than the conventional cooling system. As the cold spreads evenly across the machine it gives you fresher food and cold beverages on every shelves. (Based on UL test results using LG's internal testing method comparing time for the temperature of the water container placed in the top basket to drop between Door Cooling+ and Non-Door Cooling+ models. Applicable models only). With Wi-Fi, you can control and diagnose your refrigerator by your smart phone even when you're not at home. Easily set the refrigerator temperature, control Express Freeze, and diagnose your refrigerator with simple touch on your smart phone. Multiple cooling air vents distribute and circulate cool air to every corner of the refrigerator, ensuring that each and every food item is properly cooled. This refrigerator comes with 2 shelves of spill proof Trimless tempered Glass material that are meant to carry heavy load without any spillage, space to keep as much as 2 Litre bottles in the refrigerator doors, egg tray and a vegetable compartment with 33 ltr. Capacity, and air tighten gasket. Special features of this refrigerator are Hygiene Fresh remove bacteria up to 99.999%, its big deodorizer minimize bad odor in the refrigerator and do not need any stabilizer (100V to 310V).
